name: Nonie Sharp
biography: Dr Nonie Sharp ('Mer') has worked with Torres Strait Islander peoples since 1978 and was involved in the earilest stages of the Mabo case. Her books include 'No Ordinary Judgment: Mabo, the Murray Islanders' Land Case' (1996), 'Stars of Tagai: The Torres Strait Islanders' (1993) and 'Footprints along the Cape York Sandbeaches' (1992). In 2001 she will publish 'Seascape and Memory: Tropical Australia and the Salt Water Peoples'.
